metadata.name: Persona Assessment
metadata.description: 3-question assessment to identify user persona (Vibe Seeker, Vibe Riser, Movement Maker)

questions.question: Where are you in your journey?
questions.subtext: Be honest - there's no wrong answer

options.label: Searching for my direction
options.description: I'm exploring what I want to do

options.label: I know what I want to build
options.description: I have clarity, now I need to execute

options.label: Already making money, ready to scale
options.description: I'm generating revenue and want to grow

questions.question: What have you created so far?
questions.subtext: Think about your business or side project

questions.question: What would make this month a win?

vibe_seeker.name: Vibe Seeker
vibe_seeker.description: You're at the beginning of your journey, sensing there's more to life. Your next step is discovering your unique gifts and how to share them with the world.

vibe_riser.name: Vibe Riser
vibe_riser.description: You know your direction but need help monetising it. Your next step is creating an irresistible offer that people feel silly saying no to

movement_maker.name: Movement Maker
movement_maker.description: You're making money and ready to scale. Your next step is building a money model that maximizes your impact and cashflow.
